verses.text: In the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3099"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

He was \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehoaddan|strong="H3086"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w yet|strong="H7535"\w* not like \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all things as \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*.

Howbeit the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*: as \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* on the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, as soon as the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* was \w confirmed|strong="H2388"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* which had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w murderers|strong="H5221"\w* he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* not: according unto that which is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, wherein the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall not be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, nor the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* for the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; but every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* for his own \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

He \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Selah|strong="H5554"\w* by \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of it \w Joktheel|strong="H3371"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft Selah: or, the rock\f*

¶ Then \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, let us \w look|strong="H7200"\w* one another in the \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and there \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by a \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and trode \w down|strong="H7429"\w* the \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w*.

Thou hast \w indeed|strong="H5221"\w* \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* hath lifted thee \w up|strong="H5375"\w*: \w glory|strong="H3513"\w* \add of this\add*, and \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*: for why shouldest thou \w meddle|strong="H1624"\w* to \add thy\add* \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*, that thou shouldest \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \add even\add* thou, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* with thee?\f + \fr 14.10 \ft at home: Heb. at thy house\f*

But \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*. Therefore \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; and he and \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* one another in the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* at \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* was put to the \w worse|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 14.12 \ft put…: Heb. smitten\f*

And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, at \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H6555"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* unto the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w hostages|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, and how he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* with the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ And \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

Now they \w made|strong="H7194"\w* a \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* against him in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*; but they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him there.

And they \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* him on \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: and he was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

¶ And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, which \add was\add* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* instead of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*.\f + \fr 14.21 \ft Azariah: also called, Uzziah\f*

He \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Elath|strong="H0359"\w*, and \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* it to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ In the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \add and reigned\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from all the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

He \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amittai|strong="H0573"\w*, the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, which \add was\add* of \w Gath-hepher|strong="H1662"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that it was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4784"\w*: for \add there was\add* \w not|strong="H0657"\w* any shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*, nor any \w left|strong="H5800"\w*, nor any \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* not that he would blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: but he \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, how he \w warred|strong="H3898"\w*, and how he \w recovered|strong="H7725"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, \add which belonged\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, are they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add even\add* with the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w Zachariah|strong="H2148"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
